document_data.mainbody:
Mamood lived in the Pilgrims District of Huzuz in 1367 DR.
Mamood owned a large tent in the Pilgrims District which he rented out to travelers and pilgrims, providing them with a safe place to sleep for only one bit per night. Mamood did not provide food, but did employ a few mercenaries to ensure his guests slept soundly.
